about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Rank 17 Federation gunship fighter “Manul”
  • Special weapon “Fury plasma gun”
  • Active module “Shield generator overcharge”
  • Unique portrait “Stormbringer”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Permanent 10% bonus to credits gain
  • Paint “Clockwork tangerine”
  • Decor “Crystal aurora”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Aiming overcharge
  • Inhibitor swarm
  • Combat reboot
  • Vernier engines
  • Catalyst injector
  • Emergency barrier
  • Voltage regulator
  • Adaptive shield
  • Reinforced beams
  • Crystal plates
  • Proton wall
  • Infrared scanner


Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

Manul is a gunship fighter used by the Armada for several years now. For a long time, the existence of this ship was considered a myth, as the army commanders carefully concealed information about their fighter, using it only during punitive raids on pirate bases.

Ships of the Manul type showed themselves in battles with the best side. The perfect combination of strike weaponry and updated onboard radio-electronic equipment allows the attack fighter to effectively destroy targets of even much larger size than itself. According to recent Armada reports, operating in small squads, the Manul pilots are capable of clearing the defences of a small outpost in the shortest amount of time. By affecting a specific target, the ship’s special module severely weakens the enemy. When fighting highly maneuverable targets, the attack fighter will be supported by a weapon that increases its own rate of fire.

The recent publication of the patents for Manul from the “Outpost” shipyard, combined with the Armada’s authorization to sell the gunship to third parties, can only mean one thing. The Federation army has received an even more advanced fighter.

Currently, any UMC mercenary can order the Manul gunship fighter along with its unique weapons. The “Outpost” shipyard will fulfill the order as soon as possible.

name: Star Conflict - Manul (Deluxe edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
